disabled.name: Disabled
disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

margin.name: Margin
margin.description: Defines the margin applied to the component

checked.name: Checked
checked.description: If true, the component is checked

fullWidth.name: Full width
fullWidth.description: If true, the component takes up the full width of its container

defaultValue.name: Default value
defaultValue.description: The default value. Use when the component is not controlled

disablePadding.name: Disable padding
disablePadding.description: If true, disables the default padding

sx.name: Sx
sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles

disableGutters.name: Disable gutters
disableGutters.description: If true, disables the left and right padding

required.name: Required
required.description: If true, the input element is required

error.name: Error
error.description: If true, the component is displayed in an error state

onChange.name: onChange
onChange.description: Callback fired when the value is changed

onClick.name: onClick
onClick.description: Callback fired when the component is clicked

noWrap.name: No wrap
noWrap.description: If true, the text will not wrap, but instead will truncate with a text overflow ellipsis

gutterBottom.name: Gutter bottom
gutterBottom.description: If true, the text will have a bottom margin

MuiButton.name: Button
MuiButton.description: A button component used to trigger actions or events

disableElevation.name: Disable elevation
disableElevation.description: Removes the button shadow when set to true

loading.name: Loading
loading.description: Displays a loading indicator and disables interaction

fullWidth.name: Full width
fullWidth.description: Makes the button group span the full container width

orientation.name: Orientation
orientation.description: Sets the layout direction of the buttons

MuiCheckbox.name: Checkbox
MuiCheckbox.description: Allows selecting one or more options

MuiRadioGroup.name: Radio group
MuiRadioGroup.description: Allows selecting a single option from a set

name.name: Name
name.description: Name attribute used to group radio buttons

MuiRadioItem.name: Radio item
MuiRadioItem.description: A single radio button used within a radio group

autoFocus.name: Auto focus
autoFocus.description: Automatically focuses the field on mount

MuiSwitch.name: Switch
MuiSwitch.description: Toggle control for switching between two states

MuiTextField.name: Text field
MuiTextField.description: Input field for text and form data

multiline.name: Multiline
multiline.description: Renders a textarea instead of a single-line input

maxRows.name: Max rows
maxRows.description: Maximum number of visible rows for multiline input

autoFocus.name: Auto focus
autoFocus.description: Automatically focuses the field on mount

type.name: Type
type.description: HTML input type (text, password, email, etc.)

MuiTypography.name: Typography
MuiTypography.description: Displays text with predefined typography styles

MuiTooltip.name: Tooltip
MuiTooltip.description: Displays contextual information on hover, focus, or touch

arrow.name: Arrow
arrow.description: Displays an arrow pointing to the target element

disableFocusListener.name: Disable focus listener
disableFocusListener.description: Prevents the tooltip from appearing on focus

disableInteractive.name: Disable interactive
disableInteractive.description: Disables interaction with the tooltip content

disableHoverListener.name: Disable hover listener
disableHoverListener.description: Prevents the tooltip from appearing on hover

disableTouchListener.name: Disable touch listener
disableTouchListener.description: Prevents the tooltip from appearing on touch

followCursor.name: Follow cursor
followCursor.description: Makes the tooltip follow the cursor position

enterDelay.name: Enter delay
enterDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before showing the tooltip

leaveDelay.name: Leave delay
leaveDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before hiding the tooltip

title.name: Title
title.description: Text content displayed inside the tooltip

MuiList.name: List
MuiList.description: Displays a vertical list of items

MuiListItem.name: List item
MuiListItem.description: Represents a single item inside a list

divider.name: Divider
divider.description: Displays a divider below the list item

MuiCircularProgress.name: Circular progress
MuiCircularProgress.description: Indicates loading or progress in a circular form

thickness.name: Thickness
thickness.description: Controls the stroke width of the circle

MuiErrorWrapper.name: Error wrapper
MuiErrorWrapper.description: Wraps content and displays an error state or message

MuiLinearProgress.name: Linear progress
MuiLinearProgress.description: Indicates loading or progress in a linear bar

valueBuffer.name: Value buffer
valueBuffer.description: Secondary buffer value for buffered progress mode

MuiBox.name: Box
MuiBox.description: Generic layout container with system styling support

fixed.name: Fixed
fixed.description: Sets a fixed max width instead of a fluid one

maxWidth.name: Max width
maxWidth.description: Defines the maximum width of the container

MuiStack.name: Stack
MuiStack.description: Layouts children in a one-dimensional stack

direction.name: Direction
direction.description: Defines whether items are stacked in a row or column

flexWrap.name: Flex wrap
flexWrap.description: Controls whether items wrap onto multiple lines

useFlexGap.name: Use flex gap
useFlexGap.description: Uses CSS gap instead of margins for spacing

MuiCard.name: Card
MuiCard.description: Surface component for grouping related content

useHeaderAction.name: Use header action
useHeaderAction.description: Enables an action area inside the header

useHeaderAvatar.name: Use header avatar
useHeaderAvatar.description: Displays an avatar inside the header

useSubheader.name: Use subheader
useSubheader.description: Displays a subheader below the main header

useMedia.name: Use media
useMedia.description: Enables a media section inside the card

useActions.name: Use actions
useActions.description: Displays an actions section at the bottom

useCardActionArea.name: Use card action area
useCardActionArea.description: Wraps content with a clickable action area

header.name: Header
header.description: Content rendered in the card header

headerAction.name: Header action
headerAction.description: Action element displayed in the header

headerAvatar.name: Header avatar
headerAvatar.description: Avatar element displayed in the header

subHeader.name: Sub header
subHeader.description: Secondary text displayed below the header

media.name: Media
media.description: Media content such as an image or video

actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Action buttons or controls for the card

onSelect.name: onSelect
onSelect.description: Callback triggered when the card is selected

MuiBreadcrumbs.name: Breadcrumbs
MuiBreadcrumbs.description: Shows the current page location within a hierarchy

maxItems.name: Max items
maxItems.description: Specifies the maximum number of breadcrumbs to display

itemsAfterCollapse.name: Items after collapse
itemsAfterCollapse.description: If max items is exceeded, the number of items to show after the ellipsis

itemsBeforeCollapse.name: Items before collapse
itemsBeforeCollapse.description: If max items is exceeded, the number of items to show before the ellipsis

separator.name: Separator
separator.description: Element used to separate breadcrumb items

MuiLink.name: Link
MuiLink.description: Clickable element for navigation or actions

MuiFormControlLabel.name: Form control label
MuiFormControlLabel.description: Associates a label with a form control

labelPlacement.name: Label placement
labelPlacement.description: Position of the label relative to the control

MuiFormLabel.name: Form label
MuiFormLabel.description: Label for grouping or describing form fields

MuiUploader.name: Uploader
MuiUploader.description: Component for uploading one or more files

MuiDialog.name: Dialog
MuiDialog.description: A modal dialog component that displays content in an overlay

open.name: Open
open.description: If true, the dialog is open

fullScreen.name: Full screen
fullScreen.description: If true, the dialog will be full screen

fullWidth.name: Full width
fullWidth.description: If true, the dialog stretches to maxWidth

maxWidth.name: Max width
maxWidth.description: Maximum width of the dialog (xs, sm, md, lg, xl)

scroll.name: Scroll
scroll.description: Determines the container for scrolling the dialog (paper or body)

disableEscapeKeyDown.name: Disable escape key down
disableEscapeKeyDown.description: If true, pressing the escape key will not close the dialog

onClose.name: onClose
onClose.description: Callback fired when the dialog is closing

disableSpacing.name: Disable spacing
disableSpacing.description: If true, the actions do not have additional margin

MuiDialogContent.name: Dialog content
MuiDialogContent.description: Main content area of a dialog

dividers.name: Dividers
dividers.description: If true, borders are added to the top and bottom of the dialog content

MuiDialogLayout.name: Dialog layout
MuiDialogLayout.description: A preset dialog layout with title, content, and action buttons
